column5: This Master’s level course aims to prepare you for managerial roles across the emerging global borderless economy, upon successful completion, through giving you the opportunity to gain a comprehensive understanding of international business challenges, together with the skills and expertise required to negotiate them successfully.
column7: UK Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 14250  International Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 17900
